title: Why can't i login to chat service?
body:
After the past few years of playing league i have never encountered this problem until just recently i how i do i fix the logging onto chat service error as i can't seem to invite friends nor see the chat in the pre game lobby which also dosnt allow me to call for my lane. I really need help fixing this as I'm extremely keen to start playing league again with my friends but nothing i do seems to fix it. 
Oh btw I'm on a school macbook which i do not know the admin password to because they don't let anyone know it so therefor i can't change the date or time settings in which some cases people have said that that works so is there any other way of fixing this issue?

replies.body:
Hey BooMheadshot2406,

Give the solutions in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting#section-mac) Riot Games Support article a shot and let me know if anything works for you!
Hey thank you for the response nothing i do seems to work could you help me find an easier way to fix this issue because its really irritating me
